meanings.definition: A person or machine that makes copies.
meanings.sent1: The copiers at the office are always busy.
meanings.sent2: I need to use the copiers to duplicate this report.
meanings.sent3: The copiers had a copying race, and the machine won!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a room full of copiers, constantly reproducing thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the copiers humming filled the room with a rhythmic beat.

meanings.definition: A device used to make copies of documents.
meanings.sent1: The copiers in the library are very efficient.
meanings.sent2: Please load the paper into the copiers before making copies.
meanings.sent3: The copiers decided to take a break and refused to copy anything.
meanings.sent4: The copiers worked tirelessly, churning out duplicates like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The copiers gleamed under the fluorescent lights, ready to replicate any document.
